  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_361</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_361</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Propiedades de los límites</string>
            <string language="en">The properties of limits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Eigenschaften von Begrenzungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les propriétés des limites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As propriedades dos limites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le proprietà dei limiti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ιδιότητες των ορίων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones herramientas y conceptos útiles para el cálculo de límites de funciones. Se estudian gráficamente las propiedades de los límites y se analizan varias indeterminaciones.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses visuals to teach useful concepts and tools for the calculation of limits. It also analyses several indeterminate forms.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cálculo de límites</string>
            <string language="en">calculation of limits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">infinito</string>
            <string language="en">infinite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">infinitésimos</string>
            <string language="en">infinitesimals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">indeterminación</string>
            <string language="en">indeterminate form</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">límite</string>
            <string language="en">limit</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Sichtbarmachungen, nützliche Konzepte und Hilfsmittel für die 
Berechnung von Begrenzungen zu unterrichten. Sie analysiert auch
einige unbestimmte Formulare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations visuels
d'enseigner des concepts utiles et des outils pour le calcul des 
limites. Il analyse également plusieurs formes indéterminées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos visuals ensinar 
conceitos úteis e ferramentas para o cálculo dos limites. 
Analisa também diversos formulários indeterminados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi rappresentazioni 
insegnare i concetti utili e gli strumenti per il calcolo dei limiti. 
Egualmente analizza parecchie forme indeterminate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τα visuals για 
να διδάξει τις χρήσιμες έννοιες και τα εργαλεία για τον 
υπολογισμό των ορίων. Αναλύει επίσης διάφορες 
απροσδιόριστες μορφές.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berechnung von Begrenzungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">endlos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">infinitesimals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unbestimmtes Formular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Begrenzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">calcul des limites</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">infini</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">infinitesimals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forme indéterminée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">limite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cálculo dos limites</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">infinito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">infinitesimals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">limite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calcolo dei limiti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">infinito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">infinitesimals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forma indeterminata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">limite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υπολογισμός των ορίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άπειρος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
